title: Development Agency Act 2021 (No.26 of 2021) (except in so far as it already
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Land Development Agency Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Land Development Agency Act 2021 

(Remaining Provisions) (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited land development agency act 2021 (remaining provisions) (commencement) order 2022

title: Development Agency Act 2021 (No.26 of 2021) (except in so far as it already
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Land
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Land 
Development Agency Act 2021 (No.26 of 2021) (except in so far as it already 
is in operation) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 December, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd January, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [724] 3

title: Development Agency Act 2021 (No.26 of 2021) (except in so far as it already
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

The purpose of this commencement order is to bring into operation from 1 
January 2023, the remaining provisions of the Land Development Agency Act 
2021 (No. 26 of 2021), namely subsection (7) of section 55, Part 9 and 
Schedules 1, 2 and 3. 

Statutory Instrument No. 712 of 2021 commenced Part 1 (other than section 
11), Part 2 (other than sections 14, 15, 17 and 21), sections 25, 26, 27 and 30, 
Part 5 and 6 and section 79 of the 2021 Act. Statutory Instrument No. 143 of 
2022 commenced sections 11, 14, 15, 17 and 21, Part 3 (except insofar as it 
was already in operation), Part 4, Part 7 (other than subsection (7) of section 
55), Part 8 and Part 10 (except insofar as it was already in operation) of the 
2021 Act. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [724]
